Package i5.las2peer.services.mRCardGameService

Class MRCardGameService

java.lang.Object
i5.las2peer.api.Configurable
i5.las2peer.api.Service
i5.las2peer.restMapper.RESTService
i5.las2peer.services.mRCardGameService.MRCardGameService
public class MRCardGameService
extends i5.las2peer.restMapper.RESTService
las2peer-Template-Service This is a template for a very basic las2peer service that uses the las2peer WebConnector for RESTful access to it. Note: If you plan on using Swagger you should adapt the information below in the SwaggerDefinition annotation to suit your project. If you do not intend to provide a Swagger documentation of your service API, the entire Api and SwaggerDefinition annotation should be removed.
